title: XGo_Official
author: XGo_Official
created_time: April 13, 2023, 06:51:30 AMLast edit: April 13, 2023, 10:21:38 AM by XGo_Official
content: Welcome to XGo!We are XGo, a multi-purpose platform where you can trade, swap, store, spend, and lend crypto. Crypto on- and off-ramps included. On top of 170+ cryptocurrencies, we support over 40 fiat currencies.Here's what sets us apart:Superfluid staking (an innovative service allowing to stake coins without locking them)Spot trading (over 130 cryptocurrencies)Margin trading (up to x12 leverage)Crypto futures trading (x25 to x100 leverage)Maker-taker fee modelLive market dataAffiliate ProgramCrypto-to-crypto, fiat-to-crypto, crypto-to-fiat swapsCryptocurrency wallets operated via a unified address (WalletID)Crypto borrowing serviceAnd, we are excited to launch virtual bank cards soon!We offer multiple payment options including bank transfer and credit/debit card.Our intuitive interface, rich functionality, competitive fees, strong security, API, and other features make us suitable for both newbies and experienced crypto investors.You can download XGo mobile app from the App Store or Google Play. For queries and support, you can reach us via our website, email, or social media pages:XGo website: https://xgo.comAddress for general queries: support@xgo.comToken listing: https://plus.xgo.com/add-tokenXGo on Twitter: https://twitter.com/XGo_officialXGo on Telegram: https://t.me/+Z536yScjjQg0NzE0XGo on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/xgo_official/XGo on Discord: https://discord.xgo.com/Screenshot:https://i.imgur.com/2oT3FKm.pngFeel free to contact us if you have something to say about XGo or want to ask some questions. Our support team is working daily. You can contact us via the social media pages mentioned above or message us here on BitcoinTalk!

comments.author: .cryptokiller
comments.body: Sounds interesting. Going to check this XGo out.

comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: Hello and welcome to the forum.I like the concept of your project but you need to create a marketable Announcement thread.Nonetheless, I hope you're planning to market on this forum as well. In that area, I can help you with Bitcointalk marketing with the perfect tactics. This forum could be a helpful advertisement platform for your project since most industry-leading crypto projects once do the same exact marketing.Best wishes.

comments.author: XGo_Official
comments.body: Quote from: frank07a on April 14, 2023, 10:06:42 AMQuote from: XGo_Official on April 13, 2023, 06:51:30 AMWelcome to XGo!We are XGo, a multi-purpose platform where you can trade, swap, store, spend, and lend crypto. Crypto on- and off-ramps included. On top of 170+ cryptocurrencies, we support over 40 fiat currencies.Here's what sets us apart:Superfluid staking (an innovative service allowing to stake coins without locking them)Spot trading (over 130 cryptocurrencies)Margin trading (up to x12 leverage)Crypto futures trading (x25 to x100 leverage)Maker-taker fee modelLive market dataAffiliate ProgramCrypto-to-crypto, fiat-to-crypto, crypto-to-fiat swapsCryptocurrency wallets operated via a unified address (WalletID)Crypto borrowing serviceAnd, we are excited to launch virtual bank cards soon!We offer multiple payment options including bank transfer and credit/debit card.Our intuitive interface, rich functionality, competitive fees, strong security, API, and other features make us suitable for both newbies and experienced crypto investors.You can download XGo mobile app from the App Store or Google Play. For queries and support, you can reach us via our website, email, or social media pages:XGo website: https://xgo.comAddress for general queries: support@xgo.comToken listing: https://plus.xgo.com/add-tokenXGo on Twitter: https://twitter.com/XGo_officialXGo on Telegram: https://t.me/+Z536yScjjQg0NzE0XGo on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/xgo_official/XGo on Discord: https://discord.xgo.com/Screenshot:https://i.imgur.com/2oT3FKm.pngFeel free to contact us if you have something to say about XGo or want to ask some questions. Our support team is working daily. You can contact us via the social media pages mentioned above or message us here on BitcoinTalk!In the next topic, they talk about mandatory verification. Is it true?Yes, it's true. To keep everything safe and secure, while making your experience straightforward is a huge value of ours.For this reason, if you simply want to see how we work, we’ll give you starter access. Yet, you’ll be pretty limited in what you can do. As you build your confidence, or simply want to increase your limits, just follow our verification process.Starter: 0.01 BTC or €‎0.00Standard: 1 BTC or €‎15,000 Premium: 30 BTC or €‎15,000 (daily)You may always refer to our Support page.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: WARNINGThis Exchange is using shill accounts to bump the thread and create a fake hype. The exchange is suspicious and is a most likely scam, please refer to this thread for more details about their shady behavior  - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5448660.0Quote from: frank07a on April 18, 2023, 09:54:51 AMGot it, thanks for the reply.Do you plan to add your site to Coincap?Hey shill account, why are you asking yourself a question? Your accounts were connected hereQuote from: logfiles on April 14, 2023, 10:34:30 PMNot just that.Including OP, who just woke up to post about the mysterious exchange. Notice the similarity in their activity patterns1. n0tailbg Woke up 4/13/2023 10:27:39 AM2. aria.newman Woke up 4/14/2023 10:12:39 AMAlso, more shills in the other thread4. .cryptokiller Woke up 4/13/2023 7:34:12 AM5.  frank07a Woke up 4/14/2023 10:02:26 AMThis clearly shows that this exchange should not be trusted at all.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Quote from: XGo_Official on April 17, 2023, 11:53:49 AMStarter: 0.01 BTC Me and another member made an account and this wasn't the case for us, or is this only for selected users?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: frank07a on April 20, 2023, 06:04:27 AMI don't ask myself a question, but I ask a question to the topic creator.P.S. If you have vision problems, see your doctor.Do you think we are stupid here?You have no idea how much I hate shill accounts that are just created to bump threads and build fake buzz. In fact, I totally doubt the credibility of service that go down the path of using shill accountsFor that case, when I get time, I am going to leave feedback on all your shill accounts. In fact, I was trying to be lenient. Well, not anymore.
